website_summaries.verdict: A great little stool for a lot of uses.
cons: This is a relatively short stool
It is not made for bar-height table tops

customer_reviews.title: Great stool - light weight, sturdy, stackable
customer_reviews.text: Great stools! We bought a few of these for our office, each person has one by their desk for when they are collaborating with other colleagues. They are relatively sturdy. I like that they are stackable and light weight and I really like the all white color option. Only reason I am not giving it 5 stars is bc I feel it was a little over priced. I bought them for $18/each.
customer_reviews.author: Deedle

customer_reviews.title: Does the job but it’s very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this stool for the shower and it came in the worst Saran Wrap type packaging. And none of the screws needed were included in the packageing. I went to a local hardware store and they helped me find the right screws and that was fine but it’s not very sturdy still. Does the job and is inexpensive so I guess I can’t complain but the no hardware was annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Kalirojo

customer_reviews.title: Too short
customer_reviews.text: This is a counter stool only if you are 10 feet tall, or like to rest your nose on the counter.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I need
customer_reviews.text: I live in Hawaii and we don't have an Ikea here. I needed a stool for my occasional sewing projects. I love mid century modern and bent ash stools are gorgeous, but too expensive, too heavy, and too bulky for a chair that I only need once every few months. The shipping cost more than the stool, but Ikea prices are good enough to make this a bargain for me. Stool is beautifully designed, easy to assemble, sturdy and easy to store.
customer_reviews.author: Bibiana

customer_reviews.title: Good enough
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter to sit at her vanity. She made a custom cushion for the top, otherwise it would not be comfy. I wouldn’t recommend anyone over 150 pounds sit on it. Worked for my 15 year old.
customer_reviews.author: SandyBee

customer_reviews.title: but I don’t have one in the area Very nice stool Use it in the shower for convenience
customer_reviews.text: They cell them for five bucks in ikea, but I don’t have one in the area Very nice stool Use it in the shower for convenience, very sturdy
customer_reviews.author: Mbna P.

customer_reviews.title: Short and small
customer_reviews.text: Seat itself is very small and low to ground, not the most stable for heavy or long legged ppl, ok for small kid (under age 14 or so)
customer_reviews.author: A BeeDaBah BahDaBeeBaDoo

customer_reviews.title: Its the perfect size for me and fits under the table when ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my Massage Therapy room. Its the perfect size for me and fits under the table when not in use. Easy to assemble and very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: MizMuffy

customer_reviews.title: Good product, good price
customer_reviews.text: It's a pretty simple, but sturdy stool that looks nice. Assembly was super easy, as well.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Pretty &Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty, sturdy and sleek. Great for my teenage daughter’s vanity.
customer_reviews.author: Carmen Berbel

customer_reviews.title: Ordered for the shower as I was recovering from back ...
customer_reviews.text: Ordered for the shower as I was recovering from back surgery, works well and has been stable and supportive I weigh 180lbs and have had no issues
customer_reviews.author: John Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great design and very sturdy too. I use it for a shower stool and it works perfectly for that.
customer_reviews.author: dave

customer_reviews.title: Versatile
customer_reviews.text: I needed a simple vanity stool. I also have some of these in my classroom. Easy to assemble. Easier than making a trip all the way to Ikea.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Simple Stool
customer_reviews.text: Was as new and authentic EXACTLY as described, easy to put together, shipped on time... was a good experience What more can I say?
customer_reviews.author: Laurie lawrence

customer_reviews.title: Great little stool!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my diy to go with my vanity. Definitely think the price was a little extreme but only bought it since I couldn’t order it directly from Ikea
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The chair is good and indeed an IKEA chair
customer_reviews.text: The chair is good and indeed an IKEA chair. Easy to assemble. But the price is higher than directly purchasing from IKEA. I can't visit IKEA in person. So a good choice for my case.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Great to us in the shower.
customer_reviews.text: It was great to be able to use this in the shoer.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: It’s a great minimalistic stool.
customer_reviews.text: I liked how it was easy to assemble and that it came quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Micaela Canales

customer_reviews.title: Worth your money!
customer_reviews.text: Cheap and sturdy. What more could you ask for?! 😄
customer_reviews.author: Abbey Rubio

customer_reviews.title: screws were missing
customer_reviews.text: Screws are missing ! i couldnt even put it together.
customer_reviews.author: Val

customer_reviews.title: Great for student desk seating
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to use it as a lamp table. If using it as stool one needs a fitted cushion. Great for student desk seating.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: nice to have
customer_reviews.text: fast delivery, easy assembly, a bit of pricy but like it.
customer_reviews.author: cg

customer_reviews.title: DANGEROUS!
customer_reviews.text: ATENCIÓN!!! This are very cheap and dangerous stools DO NOT BUY!, I purchased mine Omar ikea, I am a very skinny 135p guy and they broke I end up going to the doctor cause I tough I broke my hip., seriously dangerous, they should not be in the market., keep away from elder people.
customer_reviews.author: Javier Garcia

customer_reviews.title: these are great little stools for an elementary classroom
customer_reviews.text: these are great little stools for an elementary classroom. just FYI...if you have an ikea close to you, these are only 4.99 in the store.
customer_reviews.author: snikwah

customer_reviews.title: Super Occasional
customer_reviews.text: We use this stool at our architecture firm. It works great for quick conversations at a person's desk.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: IKEA Stool, White
product_meta.description: Product description Seat/ Foot: Polypropylene Leg: Steel, Epoxy powder coating
feature_bullets: The stool can be stacked, so you can keep several on hand and store them in the same space as one.
For increased stability, re-tighten the screws about two weeks after assembly and when necessary.
This stool has been tested for home use and meets the requirements for durability and safety, set forth in the following standards: EN 12520 and EN 1022.
Wipe clean with a damp cloth.
Wipe dry with a clean cloth.
